name: Bit Guy
description:
Tired of all the endless runners with a lack of personality and what a true to life arcade platformer then look no further Bit Guy is the game for you.
Offering 24 exciting, challenging, colorful levels that will test your skills and mind.
Fun for the whole family, it offers simple controls that anyone can pick up, has a beautiful feel and look.
